name: Water Wasteland
description:
Oh no! There was just a flood! Navigate through the house to the chimney and get saved!  

Water Wasteland was made in a 24 hour game jam by Grant, Max and Mia. The theme given to us was " The environment changes you".

How to play:

Touch different objects to change density. (e.g/ float, sink)

Left and right arrow keys to move around

Space bar to let go of objects.
